Name: Removal or deactivation of fire department alarm boxes.
Title: A Local Law in relation to the removal or deactivation of fire department alarm boxes.
BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

History.Description: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

History.Description: This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Notwithstanding any provision of any local law to the contrary, any fire department alarm box may be removed, deactivated or otherwise rendered unusable at the discretion of the mayor.
Â§2. This local law shall take effect immediately.
